GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v6.0
GSD.description:
netfilter: nfnetlink_osf: fix possible bogus match in nf_osf_find()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit 559c36c5a8d730c49ef805a72b213d3bba155cc8, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 22c7652cdaa8cd33ce78bacceb4e826a3f795873. For more details please see the references link.
